description:
The video clip feature is available on the paid plans of Picovico. If you are using a free plan, consider upgrading! 


If, by any chance, you are not being able to add a video clip of valid size and format with a paid subscription, it may be due to some errors in the video-clip itself. To solve this problem, try using another file or contact us at support@picovico.com.
description_text: The video clip feature is available on the paid plans of Picovico. If you are using a free plan, consider upgrading!      If, by any chance, you are not being able to add a video clip of valid size and format with a paid subscription, it may be due to some errors in the video-clip itself. To solve this problem, try using another file or contact us at support@picovico.com.
title: Why can't I add video clips to my slideshow?
